project1.title: Local Weather App
project1.description: Used API calls to retrieve data used to code a web app designed to display and forecast weather conditions by zip code. Created, read, updated and deleted data in Firebase database and added user authentication via Firebase.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX and JSON, jQuery, Task Automation with Grunt, Bootstrap 3, Firebase

project2.title: Movie Maker App
project2.description: Practiced modern JavaScript setup with Browserify, use of task runners, coding event listeners and retrieval of data from JSON files by coding a movie maker application.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Browserify, Grunt, Bootstrap 3, task automation

project3.title: Ex Factor: the Ex Tracker App
project3.description: Implemented the use of JQuery and making AJAX calls in coding a web app designed to track your ex.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Browserify, Grunt, Bootstrap 3, jQuery, AJAX, task automation
